subject: Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: U.S.C. Athletic Director Pat Haden defended his choice of Washington Coach Steve Sarkisian as the Trojans’ new coach over the interim coach, Ed Orgeron.
snippet: U.S.C. Athletic Director Pat Haden defended his choice of Washington Coach Steve Sarkisian as the Trojans’ new coach over the interim coach, Ed Orgeron.
